param.name: Risk Factor
param.dialogReference: The values in the Mass Output Load column will be multiplied by the risk factor for each water body. The resulting number is then shown in the Mass Output Load * Risk Factor. Column. The value of risk factor should be determined by the user.

param.name: Input Plumes NO₃ info
param.dialogReference: The auxiliary info file for NO3 associated with the plumes raster calculated by the transport module. The information contained in the attribute table of this file should not be manually modified.

param.name: Input Plumes NH₄ info
param.dialogReference: The auxiliary info file for NH4 associated with the plumes raster calculated by the transport module. The information contained in the attribute table of this file should not be manually modified.

param.name: Output Results for NO₃
param.dialogReference: The output is a list showing the calculated load values for each water body. The default file name is same as input plumes info shapefile, and the extension is CSV. The default storage location is also in the same location as input plumes info shapefile.

param.name: Output Results for NH₄
param.dialogReference: The output is a list showing the calculated load values for each water body. The default file name is same as input plumes info shapefile, and the extension is CSV. The default storage location is also in the same location as input plumes info shapefile.
